documents.document: @CoupeReVille there's so much more I should say but I'm not adequately equipped to do so. So I will share what I can from others who are.
@CoupeReVille thank you all for the amazing work you do, twitter friends and twitter strangers! I appreciate you all.
Not to get sentimental (although, what's the harm?) but the amazing people on my feed have helped me keep perspective these last few days
@CianTormey fierce hair game. A+
@jp_jordan Christ above...
@CoupeReVille oh yeah! and Yoshi's Wooley world for 3DS. But I'll save that one till I'm on my holidays...which will be when??
@CoupeReVille Aaaannnnnnd I'm picking up Resident Evil 7 today. For the love of God help.
@CoupeReVille I bought Rise of the Tomb Raider and turned it off as soon Lara got the stuffing beat out of her by nature. Again. Will resume
@CoupeReVille I'm about 50% through Hitman (2016). I'm about 20% through The Last Guardian. I'm still trying to platinum Dishonored 2...
I keep buying all these games I have to time to plaaaaayyyyyðŸŽ¶ðŸŽ¶
@neevok you're on!
@pauljholden I couldn't say PJ! I haven't seen that film either -_-
@jp_jordan by all accounts I hear he's quite good?
@CoupeReVille I had no plans to see it before...but it might be worth a watch now out of sheer curiosity.
Having not watched Split myself but having learned of the ending just this second (from a podcast) all I can think is...what?!!
Taoiseach Enda Kenny: Cancel the Taoiseach's St Patrick's Day visit to Washington under Trump. - Sign... https://t.co/Opz1DRL2SM via @Change
@jp_jordan @rebnalty @ruairicoleman @DontStopRewop @eoinmarron this is the red squad. they already know how to co-ordinate! damn good
@jp_jordan @Bennessy @SeanOhOgain @CianTormey what a gang to be included in! Thanks JP!
Cheers guys! Some mad talent in display, as always. https://t.co/AZcA8qYeH5
@Stephen_C_Ward thanks Stephen!
Had a lovely evening bombarding @neevok with info about all my male celebrity crushes. She is far too patient and good.
Wanna feel unfit? Try keeping juuuust ahead of a stranger who walks exactly as fast as you do. Phew!
@declanshalvey @whoajordie An amazing set of answers Dec, thank you! What a history!!
@declanshalvey @whoajordie either/or! ðŸ˜€
@declanshalvey @whoajordie this is a terribly uninformed question to ask but what was the first project you two worked on together? :)
@falldogs this is one of the coolest versions of this I've seen! ðŸ’–
To rephrase my tweet...I'm really freaking excited for this! https://t.co/w0mtSX1pfn
@jp_jordan how dare they? It's "Jappers"
Yesterday was terrifying and I felt genuine despair, but today has renewed my sense of hope. Thank you to all who march #WomensMarch
@falldogs I'm having a lot of fun with it at the moment ðŸ˜€
@falldogs you might know this already but I discovered Hitman (2016) features mirrors with actual reflections. A rare sighting indeed!!
@Priello he just can't contain all those feelings!
These are amazing ðŸ’– https://t.co/DZao4OpkUe
I can't get over the pouty face on Kylo's Nendoroid...just kill me dead! https://t.co/5QuHptU0sY
@jp_jordan ...looking at this again this might read like sarcasm but I swear it's not!
@jp_jordan oooh! that'll be a heck of a script. Full of that classic JP wit!
@fffits it's too cute for words!
@Mardcon hmm I see, I see. I guess I won't know how I feel for sure till were done ðŸ¤”
@Treestumped it's the original series we're on, and we're watching it in Japanese. That might be a contributing factor ðŸ¤”
@CoupeReVille also no spoilers please! We've a third of the series left to watch.
@CoupeReVille I guess I can see how he'd be a devisive character but on the other hand...I'll fight you?
Is Shinji an unpopular character? Some friends are showing me Evangelion for the first time and I gotta say I empathise with Shinji a lot...
Wow. I'm honored to have been a part of this team! Holy moly. https://t.co/wDpjMU9JL3
@Treestumped @finchmeredith1 this is so beautiful! You guys make a great team!
@CartoonRobinson these are great!
@rhino_ryanotto thank you!!
@neevok aw youuuu ðŸ’–I knew if I didn't do him justice, there'd be hell to pay.
@jp_jordan ah yes I've seen this before. it's a good watch!
@jp_jordan thanks Jeepers!
@HugoBoylan aw thanks Hugo, that means a lot! ðŸ’–
@Stephen_C_Ward thanks so much Stephen ðŸ˜€
@lazyafternooner this is so powerful!
@falldogs also, I had a terrible joke prepared about already having two arms...but I respect you too much to follow through with that.
@jp_jordan it might end up like the PS3 and get stronger over time. Hopefully.
@Drop_Wallet yeah that's the one thing that has me tempted.
@falldogs admittedly, I hadn't seen that trailer. https://t.co/aMk37zkYpd
Currently the Switch is a no-go for me. I'll give it a year maybe and see? Also, it'll need amazing virtual console options to win me over.
@Stephen_C_Ward thanks Stephen!
@CoupeReVille I'm getting real Sonic '06 vibes from Odessey though. The "humans" look real bad 0_0
@CoupeReVille Breath of the Wild and Mario Odessey look fun. There's nothing else that jumps out at me though. Will wait for a bit.
So much Switch news.
@RedCube_Studio you're probably booked up with cats so I'll use this as an excuse to show off. Rascal https://t.co/O4K0YMRbAF
@Katiecanartgood excellent design choice Katie !!! If I were to get a tattoo I would get something like this. My childhood summed up!ðŸ’–ðŸ’–
@DontStopRewop @declanshalvey ooh! This is awesome!!

Sketching what was probably my first ot3, way back before I knew what an ot3 was. ðŸ’–ðŸ’–ðŸ’–
I want toâ€¦ https://t.co/jovpQEoqiD
@AdlaiM I'm particularly fond of that last one.
@declanshalvey Happy Birthday Dec!
@deevseverything Aw, thanks so much Dee!! This made my morning ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€
Bless this cast. https://t.co/5GhAJtRF5Y
@TheBigBang_ this looks like a candid on-set photo. DC are so weird with their promo images for this film...
My kingdom for an AU road trip movie. https://t.co/IkSBH07bTZ
I got around to Arrival at long last and it is just such a beautiful film. I was close to tears at several points.
@fffits Ahhhhh!!! Louise that's amazing news!
@rebnalty woah Rebecca! ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€

Just booked a table for Dublin Comic Con in August.
Commence panic.
@Stephen_C_Ward thanks Stephen!
@bru_bat that's where you shave the middle and keep the sides long, yeah?
@CoupeReVille other than that it's an exercise in embarrassment
The only good aspect of making a new profile pic is that I get to give myself nicer hair than I actually have.
@fffits I LOVE this!
I know so little about it to date, and I'm delighted. I wanna go in blind.
Woah?? I only have to avoid media for two more months? Hot dang! https://t.co/CzUHJC3VRa
@TaraaFerguson oh goodness Tara!! Congratulations!!!!
@AdlaiM is a treasure.
I really wish I didn't have places to be today. https://t.co/uBt1sq7MAU
@AdlaiM aw, I missed this but what a nice idea!
@lazyafternooner those two are perfect!
@Cat_Mangan thanks Cat! Looking forward to seeing what you do too!
@declanshalvey @whoajordie amazing work guys! Holy cow...
@deevseverything ohmygod Dee. I don't think there's a more fabulous person on Twitter than you.
@declanshalvey thank you so, so much Dec! Happy New Year to you and the crew at @RedCube_Studio
@lets_hopscotch aw thanks Rebecca! Your work is a constant inspiration for me ðŸ’–ðŸ’–
@KirbishArt incredible work Martin!!
@ruairicoleman we absolutely do! I can't wait to see what you do this year, Ru. I've no doubt it'll be a great year for you.
@saintworksart thanks very much Matthew! You have some incredible work yourself!
@CoupeReVille thank you all so much for following along and for the words of encouragement. I'd be lost without ye all.
I produced more art more than I ever have in a single year this year. I want to keep that going in 2017. Some plans in the works already.
@ruairicoleman @CianTormey yeah but will Buzzfeed write a list based around it?
@StockmanNate aw thanks for saying so Nate. I went back and forth on the layout a lot.
@lazyafternooner aw, thank you very much Jen!!
